result.longName: ATP Yazilim ve Teknoloji Anonim Sirketi

assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: ATP Ticari Bilgisayar Agi ve Elektrik Guc Kaynaklari Uretim Pazarlama ve Ticaret A.S. provides software platforms and services to finance, hospitality, and other industries in Turkey and internationally. It develops and markets enterprise class software solutions under the Tradesoft, Zenia, and ATP Digital brands. The company provides digital transformation services, which include supply chain, manufacturing, sales process optimization, and other scalable solutions with Microsoft Dynamics platform and its own software applications; infrastructure services, including hardware, software, and maintenance services for infrastructure management, compliance, and audits; and IT services comprising analytics, on site, and remote support services.It also offers cloud services, including cloud economics and migration, architecture development and execution, datacenter planning and moves, cloud services integration, capacity and performance management, cloud infrastructure management and support, applications and life cycle management, and cloud DR services; and consulting services comprising risk management, enterprise resource planning, IT strategy development and management, customer relationship management, big data management and analysis, outsourcing management, technology and service management, and compliance and audit services. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Ceyhan  Er
